00007 Contents:     A module to sort PulseIslands in time
00008               and then stitch them together.

00043 static unsigned int nBUSamples;

00061 static bool pulse_islands_t_comp(TPulseIsland *a, TPulseIsland *b);
00062 static void pulse_islands_stitch(std::vector<TPulseIsland*>& v);

00064 
00065 INT module_init_sort_and_stitch() {
00066 
00067    /*** Get necessary data from ODB ***/
00068   char key[80];
00069   int size;
00070   unsigned int post_trigger_percentage;
00071 
00072   sprintf(key, "/Equipment/Crate 4/Settings/CAEN0/waveform length");
00073   size = sizeof(nUHSamples);
00074   db_get_value(hDB, 0, key, &nUHSamples, &size, TID_DWORD, 1);
00075   post_trigger_percentage = 80; // This is hardcoded in the frontend
00076   nUHPreSamples = (int) (0.01 * ((100 - post_trigger_percentage) * nUHSamples));
00077   
00078   return SUCCESS;
00079 
00080   sprintf(key, "/Equipment/Crate 5/Settings/CAEN/waveform length");
00081   size = sizeof(nBUSamples);
00082   db_get_value(hDB, 0, key, &nSamples, &size, TID_DWORD, 1);
00083   sprintf(key, "/Equipment/Crate 5/Settings/CAEN/post_trigger_size");
00084   size = sizeof(post_trigger_percentage);
00085   db_get_value(hDB, 0, key, &post_trigger_percentage, &size, TID_BYTE, 1);
00086   //nBUPreSamples = (int) (0.01 * ((100 - post_trigger_percentage) * nBUSamples));
00087   nBUPreSamples = 20; // From the Golden Data, it looks like there are 20 presamples.
00088                     // The frontend does not seem to correctly load post_trigger_size
00089                     // onto the CAEN.
00090   
00091   return SUCCESS;
00092 }
00093 
00097 INT module_event_sort_and_stitch(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00098 {
00099   // Some typedefs
00100   typedef std::map<std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00101 
00102   // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00103   // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00104   TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00105 
00106   for (std::map<std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator it=pulse_islands_map.begin(); it!=pulse_islands_map.end(); ++it)
00107     {
00108       nSamples = 0;
00109       if (TSetupData::IsBostonCAEN(it->first))
00110         nSamples = nBUSamples;
00111       else if (TSetupData::IsHoustonCAEN(it->first))
00112         nSamples = nUHSamples;
00113       if (nSamples != 0) {
00114         std::vector<TPulseIsland*> &v = it->second;
00115         std::sort(v.begin(), v.end(), pulse_islands_t_comp);
00116         pulse_islands_stitch(v);
00117       }
00118     }
00119 
00120   return SUCCESS;
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00127 bool pulse_islands_t_comp(TPulseIsland *a, TPulseIsland *b) 
00128 { 
00129   return (a->GetTimeStamp() < b->GetTimeStamp()); 
00130 }
00131 
00135 void pulse_islands_stitch(std::vector<TPulseIsland*>& pulses) {
00136   unsigned int nPulses = pulses.size();
00137   std::vector<int> next_samples, current_samples;
00138   TPulseIsland* temp_pulse;
00139   for (unsigned int iPulse = 0; iPulse < nPulses - 1; ++iPulse) {
00140     next_samples = pulses[iPulse + 1]->GetSamples();
00141     // If the next pulse is less than the set number of samples,
00142     // it's a continuation of this pulse
00143     while (next_samples.size() < nSamples) {
00144       current_samples = pulses[iPulse]->GetSamples();
00145       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < next_samples.size(); ++i)
00146         current_samples.push_back(next_samples[i]);
00147       temp_pulse = pulses[iPulse];
00148       pulses[iPulse] = new TPulseIsland(temp_pulse->GetTimeStamp(), current_samples, temp_pulse->GetBankName());
00149       delete temp_pulse;
00150       delete pulses[iPulse + 1];
00151       pulses.erase(pulses.begin() + iPulse + 1);
00152       if (!(iPulse < --nPulses - 1)) break;
00153       next_samples = pulses[iPulse + 1]->GetSamples();
00154     }
00155   }
00156 }
